title: New: Leila – (disappointed cloud) anyway
content:
After a nearly 3 year wait, London based Iranian artist Leila will follow up her well received 2008 release, ‘Blood, Looms and Blooms’. The first single to be dropped from the Warp release, due out on January 24 in the UK, is an increasingly chaotic, yet unnervingly soulful jam, thanks mostly to Mt. Sims’ desperate and longing vocals.

The album ‘(disappointed cloud) anyway’ will be released on Warp records on January 23. Preorder it HERE.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
